entry.title: Y Lash Lift Comb
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Lash Lift
Price: 9.95

The perfect accessory for Eyelash and Brow Laminations.  This small comb helps brush lashes and brows into the perfect position during a lamination. Dlux Professionals Lash Lift Y Comb can help save time by directing lashes into the correct position onto silicone shields and ensuring even spacing through the lashes. 

 

  •  Use the straight edge to stick groups of lashes or use comb side to ensure lashes are stuck straight on shields.
  • Can be safely sanitized and reused for multiple clients. 

10 Pcs in 1 Pack

entry.title: Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dlux
Type: Lash Lift
Price: 59.95

Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum

20ml

Dlux Professional Canada is proud to offer the newest innovation to Lash Lifting! Take your lash lifting to thicker and more dramatic results with the use of Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum.

This hydrolyzed keratin mask strengthens and nourishes natural lashes with Argan oil, proteins, keratin and vitamins. The nourishing mask fills the natural lash with keratin making your natural lashes thicker, fuller and longer. They will appear longer and curled without any risk of damage from the perming solution.  Eyelashes will actually become stronger from this added treatment during your lash lifts. 

Eyelash hair consists 96% of Keratin. Dlux Lash Botox consists mostly of hydrolyzed keratin ( decreased into such a small particles so it has access to the thinnest lashes) and collagen- which is a natural nourisher.

Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum can be used as an added step to ANY Lash Lifting system on the market and will help your clients reach new lifting potential. By adding Lash Botox to your lift treatments you can now tell clients confidently that they are making their lashes HEALTHIER by having this added benefit. Dlux Professional Keratin Botox Serum will also promote natural growth and will help your clients in time get longer natural lashes. 

 

 

How To Use:

Lash Botox is to be applied after you have permed and set the lashes. If you choose to tint lashes Lash Botox would be applied after tint has been completed.

 

 Apply a small amount of Keratin Lash Botox to both shields being sure to coat the lashes base to tip. Let sit for 5-10 minutes. Remove using a micro swab.  The lashes will start to slightly detach from the shield during the treatment due to the nourishing oils in the keratin treatment.  This is expected and is okay since your final step after the keratin treatment will be to remove the lashes from your shield/rod. 

 

Warnings:

Keep out of reach of children.

Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.

In case of contact rinse with plenty of water.

If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Store at room temperature and avoid direct light.

External use.

Serum should be used within 12 months from

opening.  

Perform the tolerance test.

Product not indicated for use on persons under the age of 18.

Do not use during pregnancy and / or lactation.

entry.title: Private Lash Lift Training
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lash for Less
Type: training
Price: 495.00

TO TAKE THIS TRAINING, TECHNICIAN MUST BE EYELASH EXTENSION CERTIFIED OR LIFT CERTIFIED BEFORE.

 

Lash lifting is one of the most popular procedures to come onto the eyelashing market. Lash lifts are an affordable, low maintenance option for clients wanting a natural look and curl to their lashes. Lift results last 6-8 weeks depending on a clients lash cycle. The Flawless Curl lift kit has been designed to offer a safe way to curl your clients lashes, while still nourishing them and avoiding possible chemical damage that can happen with some kits on the market today. 

The course and Kit contain:

Private one on one Lash Lift Training with a Certified Dlux Professional Master Lash Trainer.  Private training takes place In Sherwood Park, AB only on Sundays or Mondays.  Once Private training is purchased a date can be arranged with the trainers by contacting training@lashforless.com Students are required to arrange a model.  

Course is 4 hours Long and only requires one day of training. (Either a Sunday or Monday)

Certification in Lash Lift after completion and evaluation by certified trainer.

The Flawless Curl Lift Kit includes:

  • 15 Flawless Perm Solutions
  • 15 Flawless Perm Fixers
  • 15 Flawless Perm Essence (Nourishing Oil)
  • 5 pairs of Small/Medium/Large Silicon Shields
  • 1 bottle Dlux Flawless Crystal Clear Adhesive 

All other tools and products sold separately  NOT ELIGIBLE FOR COUPON CODE DISCOUNTS

 

How to Use:

Lash For Less and Dlux Professional Canada offer an online training course to instruct technicians on how to properly use the Flawless Curl Kit. After completing the online training students will submit images to LFL certified trainers and be given either a pass or fail.  Upon completion an LFL Lash Lift Certificate will be mailed to you signed by one of our Master Lash Trainers. The course comes complete with an entire Flawless Curl Lift Kit. 

 This course is non refundable once purchased. No exceptions
